Package com.paiondata.aristotle.service.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.paiondata.aristotle.service.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
Service implementation for user-related operations. This class provides methods for managing users, including creating, updating, and deleting users.

  • Method Details

    • getUserVOByOidcid

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public UserVO getUserVOByOidcid(String oidcid)
      Retrieves a user view object (VO) by their unique identifier (oidcid). Attempts to find the user by their oidcid using the UserRepository.getUserByOidcid(String) method. Throws a NoSuchElementException if the user is not found. Constructs and returns a UserVO object containing the user's details and their associated graphs. The associated graphs are retrieved using the CommonService.getGraphsByOidcid(String) method.
      Specified by:
      getUserVOByOidcid in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      oidcid - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      a UserVO object representing the user and their associated graphs
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the user with the specified oidcid is not found

    • getAllUsers

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<UserVO> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users as user view objects (VOs). Retrieves all users from the repository using the UserRepository.findAll() method. Maps each user to a UserVO object containing the user's details and their associated graphs. The associated graphs are retrieved using the CommonService.getGraphsByOidcid(String) method. Returns a list of UserVO objects.
      Specified by:
      getAllUsers in interface UserService
      Returns:
      a list of UserVO objects representing all users and their associated graphs

    • createUser

      @Transactional public UserDTO createUser(UserDTO user)
      Creates a new user.

      Attempts to create a new user in the repository using the UserRepository.createUser(String, String) method. If the user creation fails due to a data integrity violation (e.g., duplicate oidcid), a IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Returns a UserDTO object containing the details of the newly created user.

      Specified by:
      createUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      user - the UserDTO object containing the user's details
      Returns:
      a UserDTO object representing the newly created user
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a user with the same oidcid or username already exists

    • updateUser

      @Transactional public void updateUser(UserDTO userDTO)
      Updates an existing user.

      Checks if a user with the given oidcid exists using the UserRepository.checkOidcidExists(String) method. If the user exists, updates the user's username using the UserRepository.updateUser(String, String) method. If the user does not exist, throws a NoSuchElementException. If the username already exists, throws an IllegalArgumentException.

      Specified by:
      updateUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userDTO - the UserDTO object containing the updated user details
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the user with the specified oidcid does not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - if the username already exists

    • deleteUser

      @Transactional public void deleteUser(List<String> oidcids)
      Deletes multiple users and their related graphs and nodes.

      Iterates through the provided list of user identifiers (oidcids) and checks if each user exists using the CommonService.getUserByOidcid(String) method. Throws a NoSuchElementException if any user does not exist. Retrieves the UUIDs of graphs related to the users using the getRelatedGraphUuids(List) method. Retrieves the UUIDs of nodes related to the graphs using the getRelatedGraphNodeUuids(List) method. Deletes the users from the user repository using the UserRepository.deleteByOidcids(List) method. Deletes the related graph from the graph repository using the GraphRepository.deleteByUuids(List) method. Deletes the related nodes from the node repository using the NodeRepository.deleteByUuids(List) method.

      Specified by:
      deleteUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      oidcids - the list of user identifiers to be deleted
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if any user with the specified oidcid does not exist
